Package org.ow2.chameleon.testing.helpers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractHelper
    Common helper code.
    ArchitectureDumpHelper
    Dump all architectures.
    BaseTest
    A class extended by pax exam test case.
    BundleDumpHelper
    Utility methods to dump bundles.
    BundleHelper
    Eases the manipulation of `bundle` objects.
    ChameleonHelper
    Helper class initializing a chameleon.
    ChameleonOption
    Pax Exam Option to deploy a chameleon.
    ConfigAdminHelper
    A couple of method to ease interactions with the configuration admin.
    Dumps
    Dump utilities.
    FactoryHelper
    Retrieves factories.
    FestAssertOption
    Pax Exam Option to deploy Fest Assert.
    FrameworkHelper
    Utility methods to detect frameworks
    InstanceCreationHelper
    Eases the creation of component instances.
    InstanceHelper
    Lookup and Architecture.
    IPOJOHelper
    iPOJO Helper.
    IPOJOOption
    Pax Exam Option to deploy iPOJO.
    IPOJOServiceHelper
    Retrieves services provided by iPOJO instances.
    MetadataHelper
    Retrieves iPOJO metadata
    MockitoOption
    Pax Exam Option to deploy Mockito.
    OSGiAssert
    A set of assertions simplifying OSGi tests.
    OSGiHelper
    Eases the interaction with OSGi in tests.
    ServiceHelper
    Manages OSGi services.
    Stability
    Stability helper
    TestBundleOption
    Builds a bundle from the src/main/java sources.
    ThreadDumpHelper
    Dump utilities.
    TimeUtils
    Handle time
